verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-caitanya karuṇā-sindhu-avatāra
brahmā-śivādika bhaje caraṇa yāṅhāra

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-caitanya—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karuṇā-sindhu-avatāra—the incarnation of the ocean of mercy; brahmā-śiva-ādika—demigods, beginning from Lord Brahmā and Śiva; bhaje—worship; caraṇa—lotus feet; yāṅhāra—whose.
translation: All glories to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the incarnation of the ocean of mercy. His lotus feet are worshiped by demigods like Lord Brahmā and Lord Śiva.
